name: Paras
flavorText: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Parasect
flavorText: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mushroom spores it scatters.
Attack1Text: Choose 3 of your Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a different type of basic Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Pinsir
flavorText: It swings its long antlers wildly to attack. During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

name: Cacnea
flavorText: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Pansage
flavorText: It's good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It's kind enough to share them with friends.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Simisage
flavorText: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.
Attack1Text: Put 3 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of cards in your hand.

name: Chespin
flavorText: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.
Attack1Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Chespin
flavorText: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.

name: Chespin
flavorText: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Grass Energy card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Quilladin
flavorText: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won't start fights.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Chesnaught
flavorText: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Chesnaught BREAK
Attack1Text: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself. This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Scatterbug
flavorText: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Spewpa
flavorText: The beaks of birds can't begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Vivillon
flavorText: The patterns on this Pokémon's wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Skiddo
flavorText: If it has sunshine and water, it doesn't need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Gogoat
flavorText: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Cyndaquil
flavorText: It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Quilava
flavorText: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.
Attack1Text: Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is an Energy card, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Typhlosion
flavorText: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.
Attack1Text: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. This attack does 80 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. Then, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Houndoom-EX
Attack1Text: Discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck.
Attack2Text: Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: M Houndoom-EX
Attack1Text: You may discard all Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Pansear
flavorText: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Simisear
flavorText: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.
Attack1Text: Put 3 Water Energy from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of cards in your hand.

name: Fennekin
flavorText: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Braixen
flavorText: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Goldeen
flavorText: Its dorsal, pectoral and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the water dancer.
Attack1Text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Seaking
flavorText: It makes its nest by hollowing out boulders in streams with its horn. It defends its eggs with its life.
Attack1Text: If this Pokémon was healed during this turn, this attack does 80 more damage.
Attack2Text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Staryu
flavorText: It appears in large numbers by seashores. At night, its central core flashes with a red light.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Starmie
flavorText: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 7 cards.
Attack2Text: If you and your opponent have the same number of Benched Pokémon, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Remoraid
flavorText: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a Mantine's underside to scavenge for leftovers.
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Remoraid
flavorText: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a Mantine's underside to scavenge for leftovers.
Attack1Text: Discard any Stadium card in play.

name: Octillery
flavorText: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Glalie-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 100 more damage.

name: M Glalie-EX
Attack1Text: If this Pokémon has 10 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 150 more damage.

name: Piplup
flavorText: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

name: Prinplup
flavorText: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Empoleon
flavorText: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.
Ability1Text: Each of your Basic Pokémon's attacks does 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Snover
flavorText: In the spring, it grows berries with the texture of frozen treats around its belly.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Abomasnow
flavorText: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Dragon Pokémon, it is now Paralyzed.

name: Panpour
flavorText: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Simipour
flavorText: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
Attack1Text: Put 3 Grass Energy from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of cards in your hand.

name: Vanillite
flavorText: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Vanillish
flavorText: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Vanilluxe
flavorText: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
Attack1Text: Until the end of your next turn, each player can't play any Supporter or Stadium cards from his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Froakie
flavorText: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

name: Frogadier
flavorText: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute's time.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Raichu
flavorText: It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity instantly downing foes several times its size.
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon-EX. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Raichu BREAK
Attack1Text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Magnemite
flavorText: It moves while constantly hovering. It discharges Thunder Wave and so on from the units at its sides.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, its Retreat Cost is Colorless less for each Magnemite on your Bench.

name: Magnemite
flavorText: It moves while constantly hovering. It discharges Thunder Wave and so on from the units at its sides.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Magneton
flavorText: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6 degrees Fahrenheit within 3,300 feet.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Magnezone
flavorText: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Lightning Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Discard a Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Raikou
flavorText: This rough Pokémon stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity.
Ability1Text: If this Pokémon has any Lightning Energy attached to it, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Stunfisk
flavorText: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.
Attack1Text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during his or her last turn, this attack does 80 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Dedenne
flavorText: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Gastly
flavorText: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

name: Haunter
flavorText: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim's life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may leave both Active Pokémon Confused.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. That Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Gengar
flavorText: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has 3 or more damage counters on it, that Pokémon is Knocked Out.

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Psychic Energy attached to this Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Switch all damage counters on this Pokémon with those on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: M Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 50 more damage, and this attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance or any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: M Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness.

name: Misdreavus
flavorText: It likes playing mischievous tricks, such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.
Attack1Text: Put 2 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Mismagius
flavorText: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may have your opponent shuffle his or her hand into his or her deck and draw a card for each of his or her remaining Prize cards.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Wobbuffet
flavorText: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

name: Ralts
flavorText: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Kirlia
flavorText: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.
Attack1Text: Put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Cresselia
flavorText: Those who sleep holding Cresselia's feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
Ability1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.
Attack1Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Woobat
flavorText: The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a woobat has been attached to it is said to bring good fortune.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Swoobat
flavorText: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Returning Echo attack does 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, return this Pokémon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

name: Elgyem
flavorText: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Psych Up attack does 20 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Beheeyem
flavorText: It uses psychic power to control an opponent's brain and tamper with its memories.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon times the amount of Energy attached to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Sandshrew
flavorText: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Sandslash
flavorText: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Cubone
flavorText: It always wears the skull of its dead mother, so no one has any idea what its hidden face looks like.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Marowak
flavorText: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Marowak BREAK
Attack1Text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

name: Swinub
flavorText: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Piloswine
flavorText: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Colorless in the Retreat Cost of your Swinub, Piloswine, and Mamoswine.

name: Mamoswine
flavorText: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.
Ability1Text: Any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Fire or Water Pokémon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: If you have a Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 more damage. If your opponent has a Stadium card in play, heal 40 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Hippopotas
flavorText: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Gallade
flavorText: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order.
Attack1Text: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Meloetta
flavorText: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
Attack1Text: Attach 2 Fighting Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon. Then, switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Attack2Text: If this Pokémon has any Psychic Energy attached to it, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Pancham
flavorText: It does its level best to glare and pull a scary face, but it can't help grinning if anyone pats its head.
Attack1Text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Hawlucha
flavorText: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Cacturne
flavorText: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.
Attack1Text: Discard a Special Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Zorua
flavorText: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Zorua
flavorText: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Zoroark
flavorText: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch this Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Zoroark BREAK
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: Inkay
flavorText: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Yveltal
flavorText: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, each Pokémon Tool card in play has no effect.
Attack1Text: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon-EX. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Bronzor
flavorText: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has only 1 Prize card left, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Bronzong
flavorText: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.
Attack1Text: Put 3 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Mr. Mime
flavorText: It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming.
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon by attacks.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Snubbull
flavorText: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

name: Granbull
flavorText: It can make most any Pokémon run away simply by opening its mouth wide to reveal its big fangs.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 3 random cards from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals those cards and shuffles them into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: This Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Ralts
flavorText: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.

name: Flabébé
flavorText: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind's embrace with an untroubled heart.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Floette
flavorText: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Florges
flavorText: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.
Ability1Text: Each of your Pokémon's attacks costs Fairy less.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Florges BREAK
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 30 damage and remove a Special Condition from your Active Pokémon.

name: Spritzee
flavorText: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokémon.

name: Aromatisse
flavorText: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. Put 6 damage counters instead of 3 on that Pokémon for this Special Condition.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Xerneas
flavorText: When the horns on its head shine in seven different colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each different type of Pokémon on your Bench.
Attack2Text: If this Pokémon was healed during this turn, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Axew
flavorText: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.

name: Axew
flavorText: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.
Attack1Text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Fraxure
flavorText: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Dragon Pokémon, this attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Haxorus
flavorText: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.
Attack1Text: As long as this Haxorus is your Active Pokémon, each of its attacks does 100 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't add more than 100 damage in this way.

name: Noivern
flavorText: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It emerges out of the dark to attack.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Noivern BREAK
Attack1Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Meowth
flavorText: Adores round objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon. If tails, this Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Doduo
flavorText: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Draw 2 cards.

name: Doduo
flavorText: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Draw 2 cards.

name: Dodrio
flavorText: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless less.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Snorlax
flavorText: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.
Ability1Text: Any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Hoothoot
flavorText: It always stand on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.
Attack1Text: Your opponent can't play any Item cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

name: Noctowl
flavorText: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.
Attack1Text: Each player reveals his or her hand. This attack does 20 damage times the number of Item cards revealed.

name: Teddiursa
flavorText: Before food becomes scarce in wintertime, its habit is to hoard food in many hidden locations.

name: Ursaring
flavorText: Although it has a large body, it is quite skilled at climbing trees. It eats and sleeps in the treetops.
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage to the new Active Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: Smeargle
flavorText: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch a basic Energy card attached to your Active Pokémon with a different type of basic Energy card from your discard pile.

name: Swablu
flavorText: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
Attack1Text: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

name: Starly
flavorText: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for as many Starly as you like and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Staravia
flavorText: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Staraptor
flavorText: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
Attack2Text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Chatot
flavorText: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Rufflet
flavorText: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.

name: Braviary
flavorText: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

name: Noibat
flavorText: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Noibat
flavorText: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Houndoom-EX
Attack1Text: Discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck.
Attack2Text: Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: M Houndoom-EX
Attack1Text: You may discard all Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Glalie-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 100 more damage.

name: M Glalie-EX
Attack1Text: If this Pokémon has 10 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 150 more damage.

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Psychic Energy attached to this Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Switch all damage counters on this Pokémon with those on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: M Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 50 more damage, and this attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance or any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: M Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness.

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Psychic Energy attached to this Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Switch all damage counters on this Pokémon with those on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
